channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Massive puddle along area of pedestrian crossing, 10th June
item.description:
Despite reporting this multiple times, the issue absolutely has not been resolved. After just a few mm of rain overnight (Sunday 9 - Monday 10 June) the puddle is still there, approx. 5 metres long. No one actually does anything to address the reports - you just sit on them for a week and then close them, don't you?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 88, Portland Street, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole and camber in road when heading towards Hare and Hounds junction, 10th June
item.description:
Pothole and camber in degraded road surface when heading in the direction of the Hare and Hounds junction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 323, Innsworth Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weeds 4ft high along pavement walls and road curbs, 10th June
item.description:
Throughout the length or Trafalgar Drive and neighboring streets within Highgrove Park, weeds 4ft high along pavement walls and road curbs. Resulting in the weeds collecting litter, the area looking untidy, run down and not making it easy for people to pass on the footpaths, especially those with accessibility requirements. A contractor did begin cutting these back a few months ago but didn't finish the work and never returned. Is their work being quality checked against the requirement of the contractor they're working to for the local authority?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Trafalgar Drive, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Iant hogweed plants posing a risk to public safety, 10th June
item.description:
There are four large giant hogweed plants in very close proximity to the footpath, heading North on the footpath from Cold Pool Lane, causing a risk to public safety
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cold Pool Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fridge Freezer left, 10th June
item.description:

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 10th June
item.description:
A sunken pothole on the carriageway outside Beards on the carriageway. Was fixed before, but the repair has failed and the issue is back.
Report on FixMyStreet
